tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,
review:
A friend of mine had recommended Dr.Arjav Beswal to me, so I decided to book an appointment to get my teeth examined. I'd been experiencing some sensitivity so I thought I'd get that looked at.

I had no trouble getting an appointment at my preferred time. When I got to the clinic, I didn't have to wait for more than 2 mins till I was called in.

The clinic was neat and tidy and seemed very kid friendly with a few toys around for kids to play with and cartoons running on the tv, perhaps to put children at ease and in a light mood.

I met Dr.Arjav and explained my problems while he listened very carefully. He inspected my teeth and agreed that it's best to get some cleaning done immediately to relieve the sensitivity. He explained the root cause of tooth sensitivity very thoroughly and patiently to me. 

I was expecting to get some cleaning done so I was comfortable proceeding with it. I felt that the whole process went quite smoothly and with the help of his assistant, who seemed like a young, able and hardworking dental student, ensured that I felt minimal discomfort. I must say that watching Top Gear on the tv while all this was happening certainly helped too.

At then end of it, the doctor told me about the dental hygiene routine to maintain and recommended that I get my teeth checked again a couple of months later.

Overall, I was more than happy with the service and at a very affordable price point too. I'd gladly book a second appointment with Dr.Arjav Beswal. After all, that episode of Top Gear is still pending!
reply_text: Thanks for the kind words Avinash

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Divya was very professional and honest about me treatmnets... She ensured that I get extra care... I was in terrible pain and had to get 3 Re-Root Canals done.. She ensured she treated me well.. Dr Arjav did the crown placements for me... He did 7 crowns in less than a week time...measurements were perfect and i am very happy with the service delivered... Both the doctors are amazing and they are really good in their work... Quality service in great price... Thank you so much for the awesome service üòä
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words.. have a safe journey back

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Beswal and Doctor Divya both are very welcoming and friendly.  Initially I was very apprehensive about the pain that I have to bear dirong the extraction but both of them gave me full confidence and truly it didn't hurt at all. Even the medication was given as per my convenience and appointment timings are also so flexible. Due to time constraint he agreed to come specifically for me on a holiday.  Both, my parents and I were really impressed. We recommend him to everyone who loves his teeth.
reply_text: thank you so much..it was a treat to treat you !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Artificial Teeth,Endodontic treatments,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review:
Dr Arjav Beswal and Dr Divya Sinha Beswal took great care of me through my two root canal procedures. Both of them are very polite, pleasant to talk to and good at their jobs.

The cost of their services is affordable and commensurate to the quality of services, products and consultation provided.

Moreover punctuality is another great aspect to this practice, I never waited more than 5 minutes after arriving.
reply_text:
Loving the encouragement 
Made our day

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I would definately want to suggest the doc for your kids any dental treatment as he is super cool with kids and they won't even realize any movement happening in their mouth... I as a parent was more pretified than my son but the first visit to the doc actually took out all the fear from my mind also.. my kid went through 4 root canals but trust me my kid didn't have to suffer with any pain for even a minute... Thanks a ton for the wonderful treatment doc üëç

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** ****** ** *** ******* ********** *** ******* he suggested root canal for a four and half year olds milk teeth to be done under general anaesthesia. ******* ******* *** * ****** ******* *** ** ** **** **** ** ****** **** ********** ** *** ** *******  ****** **** ******** *** ******** Also keeping some dirty toys in the reception **** *** **** ****** * ********** ******** Paediatric is about earning the trust of the child and making him or her comfortable
reply_text:
Thank you for the feedback Mrs. Bhattacharya 
An x ray was advised to you which we waited for before a conclusive treatment plan, 
We treat 1% of our cases under GA, when we feel the child will not be comfortable on the chair.
We have had kids coming back with a swelling after a filling has been done elsewhere for a RCT case
Some cases filling might help temporarily, we firmly believe in a more permanent and long lasting treatment
Thank you

review: I had visitited doctor for extraction of my sons milk teeth. His price for the treatment was highly expensive.But the doctor was very gentle with kids.
reply_text:
Thank you for your valuable feedback
You might find our charges higher than a corner general dentist as we are a speciality clinic for kids and we make sure that the child is comfortable and has a painless experience, for doing so we need to use certain techniques and materials which are expensive
We also do alot of charity work for the underprivileged.
I am glad you appreciated our gentle approach and hope you understand the value for that 
Thank you and sorry for your grief
